title.value: Сортоизучение вишни войлочной (Cerasustomentosathub.) в почвенно-климатических условиях Пинского района
Variety-studying of Cerasus tomentosa Thunb. in soil-climatic conditions of Pinsk district

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Chernetskaya, A.G., Polesje State Univ., Pinsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: We have studied six varieties of Cerasus tomentosa Thunb. of foreign selection in soil-climatic conditions of the south of Belarus. We have determined the duration of vegetation period and terms of phonological phases. We have established varieties resistant to Monilinia laxa and damping-off of root neck, as well as the best pollinators. According to economically valuable indicators (high productivity, large fruits, small seeds, high taste quality, dry avulsion of cherries, maximal content of vitamin C), we have picked out the varieties Natali, Smuglyanka eastern, Yubileinaya.
